dev_items.title: Subnet Calculator and Base Conversion
dev_items.subtitle: Javascript/ HTML/ CSS
dev_items.descr: Javascript/ HTML/ CSS Web UI for calculating IPv4 and IPv6 subnets given subnet mask and desired subnet count. Technical explanation of numeral systems and base conversion also included.

dev_items.title: Green Roof Frontend Live-Data Server
dev_items.subtitle: Python3 + Flask/ HTML/ CSS/ Javascript
dev_items.descr: Python3 + Flask air quality live data collection and monitoring server.

dev_items.title: Crypto-Currency Mining and Brute Force Tools
dev_items.subtitle: Python3
dev_items.descr: Iteration tools without the use of libraries. Demonstrates recursive iteration through each permutation of a given keyspace of size n along with crypto-currency mining and private/ public key creation.

dev_items.title: Customer Database and Estimation Tools Web App
dev_items.subtitle: Python3 + Flask/ HTML/ CSS/ Javascript
dev_items.descr: Frontend + backend python3 flask server with user login + permission settings. HTML/ CSS/ Javascript calculator along with customer MySQL database. (Deployed on LAN Linux server)

dev_items.title: Distance Vector Router Simulation
dev_items.subtitle: Python3/ threading library
dev_items.descr: Multi-threaded command line python routers which communicate through sockets specified in topology configuration file. Routers determine best path through auto-correcting best path distance vector algorithm

dev_items.title: Green Roof Data Collection/ Monitoring Server
dev_items.subtitle: Zabbix4.0 + Apache2 + Python3
dev_items.descr: Zabbix monitoring software for environmental data collection and representation with secure Apache2 HTTPS server for frontend UI with signed certificate. Python scripts used for external checks/ interactions with data logging devices and 3rd party APIs.

dev_items.title: Passvault Password Manager
dev_items.subtitle: Python3/ cryptography library
dev_items.descr: Command line password manager with file and password encryption/ decryption functionality. Append, edit, and delete password entries. Built-in password generator.

dev_items.title: Raspberry PI VPN
dev_items.subtitle: Raspbian + OpenVPN
dev_items.descr: Dynamic DNS and OpenVPN Raspberry Pi VPN
